SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Epworth Sleepiness Scale - Sitting and reading.

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: ESS01-Sitting Inactive in a Public Place
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Epworth Sleepiness Scale - Sitting, inactive in a public place (e.g. a theatre or a meeting).
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: ESS - Sitting, Inactive in a Public Place

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Epworth Sleepiness Scale - As a passenger in a car for an hour without a break.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: ESS - As a Passenger in a Car for an Hour Without a Break

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: ESS01-Lying Down to Rest In Afternoon
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Epworth Sleepiness Scale - Lying down to rest in the afternoon when circumstances permit.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: ESS - Lying Down to Rest in the Afternoon When Circumstances Permit

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Epworth Sleepiness Scale - Sitting and talking to someone.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: ESS - Sitting and Talking to Someone

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Epworth Sleepiness Scale - Sitting quietly after a lunch without alcohol.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: ESS - Sitting Quietly After a Lunch without Alcohol

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: ESS01-In Car Stopped Few Minutes Traffic
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Epworth Sleepiness Scale - In a car, while stopped for a few minutes in the traffic.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: ESS - In a car, While Stopped for a Few Minutes in the Traffic
